1.title: Have It Your Way! - Extra Crispy Fries vs. Cannabis
1.plot: Two fast-food employees learn that selling weed at the drive-thru as "Extra crispy fries" may not be the best 'gateway' to their larger entrepreneurial endeavors. Changing cannabis laws are 'high'lighted.

2.title: The Taste of Trump
2.plot: No matter what your political party affiliation we all can agree Donald Trump has been involved in some 'entertaining' and bizarre legal battles. Here just a few of our all-time favorites are highlighted. Find out how an Orangutan and The Onion are involved.

3.title: Global Fox Trot
3.plot: We trotted across the globe in Australia, New Zealand, and Bali as we learn of some 'weird' laws and interesting customs. We also dove off an Auckland bridge inspired by an ancient tradition, vine jumping. Beware: You'll never think of 'Cappuccino' (Cat-Poo-chino) the same again if you watch till end. Let the cultural adventure begin.

4.title: Investing the Social Media Privacy Scandal -Make you Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter Secure
4.plot: Legal Fox a.k.a Shannon Harvey, costumed as "Sherlock Harvey," investigates tips to control your social media privacy. For this episode the team went a step beyond highlighting a funny or usual legal case or lawsuit. In additional to providing a brief legal background of the origin of the social media scandals she also gives some practical pointers to help the viewers using examples and instructional screenshots.

1.title: Elderly Man vs "Dominant" Woman
1.plot: Recounts a lawsuit involving a dominatrix taking one too many liberties with an elderly client's (a.k.a. her 'servant's) bank account.

2.title: Mafia vs. 'The Simpsons'
2.plot: Narrates and animates a lawsuit filed by actor Frank Sivera against The Simpsons when the show featured a character "Louie" believed to be based upon his likeness.

3.title: Keep Your Panties On
3.plot: Animated explanation of a baseball legend's legal battle with a posh underwear company! Things get funky! The "Ballin' briefs" lawsuit - play-by-play.

4.title: Intoxicated Fantasies Lawsuit
4.plot: Scenically illustrates a lawsuit a consumer brought against the manufacturers of Budweiser beer when drinking the beverage failed to bring to the fantasy lifestyle and women depicted in its advertisements to fruition.

imdb.plot outline: Legal Fox TV(TM) is an award-winning web series highlighting the 'Lighter Side of the Law.' The videos "report" on entertaining, actual legal cases and educate in a provocative and mildly humorous way. Each episode consists of fact-checked information on specific legal cases and either quirky re-enactments or graphics and animations, all hosted by brainy, beauty lawyer, Shannon Harvey, Esq. Legal Fox is the official 2018 winner of "Best EduTainment Host" award at Miami Web Fest and the 2017 winner in the categories "Best Talk Entertainment" and "Best Hostess" at the Baltimore New Media (BNM) Web Fest. Legal Fox TV(TM) was also awarded "Best in Edutainment" at the Miami Web Fest 2016. It has been described as "Legal Education with a Twist," "A Tantalizing Take on the Law" and finally. - an "Intellectual Arousal." ;-)
